tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    camera_id INT,
    camera_data JSON,
    lidar_id INT,
    lidar_data JSON,
    radar_id INT,
    radar_data JSON
);

CREATE TABLE sensors (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    reading_value FLOAT,
    reading_time TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE SensorData (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 sensor_id INT,
 data_type VARCHAR(20),
 data_value FLOAT
);
